item.title: Urine on stairs and outside 23a Bew Court, 23rd November
item.description:
A Male who lives on the estate who passes through this entrance bit is repeatedly urinating on these stairs and outside 23A Bew Court which is opposite the tenants hall doors. He also Urinates on both sides and bottom of stairs. It Never gets cleaned by cleaners. Not even sure if we have cleaners allocated for the lordship lane estate anymore as it never gets done. Our children have to walk through this way to go and come back from school. It’s disgusting. Southwark council We need cctv installed or splash back paint!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhead speed signs all wrong, 23rd November
item.description:
From approx junction 26 to 23 westbound m25 all the overhead signs are wrong - e.g. 4 lanes down to 2 for workmen in road - no workmen and then no forced down to two lanes; 40 miles an hour for congestion - no congestion just big wide empty roads with people going at 40 in the outside lane waiting for the cones on the inside lane but nothing there; congestion stay in lane but no congestion; 50 mile per hr for ages with no congestion and no roadworks
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Male gobbing and throwing rubbish over landing, 22nd November
item.description:
This is a regular occurrence that the male keeps gobbing over the landing from above, also gobbing on stairwell and at entrance of Bew Court by lift. Rubbish bags also being thrown over from a height! The male who is repeatedly doing this also lives in the block should be made to clean it up but it is not being cleaned up properly or rather at all by cleaners. Absolutely vile

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Another human poo in the lift, 22nd November
item.description:
Just a week after the last one, there’s another poo in the lift making it unusable if you have accessibility issues or children. There is also a puddle of urine in the corner of the stairwell between the first and second floor Please install the security doors ASAP so the junkies can’t use our block as a public toilet as they continue to do.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 56a Chesterfield Grove- Continued Flytipping, 22nd November
item.description:
Cardboard boxes is causing an obstruction on the pavement. The residents continues to flytip and I urge the council to do something as there is a continued blatant disregard for the law and the health and safety of pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Chesterfield Grove, East Dulwich, London Borough of Southwark
Report on FixMyStreet
